summary: We employ the kernelized formulation of an attention computation in Transformer, and evaluate the kernel implementation as FFNN on the subset of the Long Range Arena.
title: Linear Self-Attention Approximation via Trainable Feedforward Kernel

summary: We have suggested, that a Transformer attention module can be implemented without a nonlinearity between query and key multiplication, and evaluated our findings on the Long Range Arena subset.
title: SimpleTRON: Simple Transformer with O(N) Complexity
